lead_paragraph: The nun, Yeshi Khando, was the 138th Tibetan to self-immolate since 2009 in Tibetan regions ruled by China, according to the International Campaign for Tibet.

headline.print_headline: Tibetan Nun Calling for End to China Rule and Dalai Lama’s Return Sets Self on Fire
headline.main: Tibetan Nun Calling for End to China Rule and Dalai Lama’s Return Sets Self on Fire

snippet: The nun, Yeshi Khando, was the 138th Tibetan to self-immolate since 2009 in Tibetan regions ruled by China, according to the International Campaign for Tibet.
abstract: Tibetan nun Yeshi Khando sets herself on fire to protest Chinese rule and to call for return of Dalai Lama from exile.
